description.text: One of the painting with a set of high quality hues straight from the tube. I had no idea what will come up from this painting but I love having it in my living room on the wall. I'm looking for a new owner for this relaxing painting.

I never know what's going to come up from my paintings. I like to tease your imagination and find regions of the canvas that makes you feel happy, or a bit anxious, surprised, confused. This one reminds of the condensed areas of the city (Barcelona), or patchwork of agriculture fields in the country side.
